00049         public function __construct($header, $body, $status = null)
00050         {
00051                 $this->header = $header;
00052                 $this->body = $body;
00053                 $this->status = $status;
00054 
00055                 if (isset($body))
00056                 {
00057                         // If the response is XML data, parse it.
00058                         if (substr(ltrim($body), 0, 5) == '<?xml')
00059                         {
00060                                 $this->body = new SimpleXMLElement($body);
00061                         }
00062                 }
00063

00075         public function isOK($codes = 200)
00076         {
00077                 if (is_array($codes))
00078                 {
00079                         return in_array($this->status, $codes);
00080                 }
00081                 else
00082                 {
00083                         return ($this->status == $codes);
00084                 }
00085         }
